Company Overview.Name: Elixir Capital Ltd
Company Overview.Business Description: Incorporated in 1994, Elixir Capital Ltd is in the business of investing in shares and securities and of providing services of capital market research and analysis. Company does trading and investment in shares and provides research services. It manages investment and trading portfolio focused on small and mid cap stocks.
